targets.query: SELECT (("ms_per_write_op") + ("ms_per_read_op"))/2 FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter

panels.content: Supports flash, EPM, FIN, Tier - Fin has 12+ copies on this array - deduplication rate is 18:1
panels.title: Background
Read Latency, Write Latency, and Average Latency

targets.query: SELECT (("reads_per_sec") + ("writes_per_sec")) FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "reads_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "writes_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT (("input_per_sec") + ("output_per_sec")) FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "input_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "output_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "queue_depth" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("pct_used") FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_capacity_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_used_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_free_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Pure' AND "array" = 'sa0319ps03' AND $timeFilter
